title: It's about getting people into the digital economy: Kelly Mahon Tullier, Vice Chair, Visa
description: At ET World Leaders Forum, Kelly Mahon Tullier, Visa’s Vice Chair and Chief People Officer, talked about Visa's role in accelerating digital payments and financial inclusion, especially in India. She highlighted Visa’s innovation efforts, partnerships with regulators, support for small businesses, and initiatives empowering women entrepreneurs to thrive in the digital economy.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
